analyzed: sabbadhi vippamuttaḥ ti tedhātuke ayam asekkhā vimutti

original: Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni, ayaṁ indriyehi otaraṇā.
Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni vijjā, vijjuppādā avijjānirodho, avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho,
analyzed: tāni yeva asekkhāni pañca indriyāni vijjā vijjuppādā avijjā nirodhaḥ avijjā nirodhā saṅkhāra nirodhaḥ

original: saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho, viññāṇanirodhā nāmarūpanirodho, nāmarūpanirodhā saḷāyatananirodho,
analyzed: saṅkhāra nirodhā viññāṇa nirodhaḥ viññāṇa nirodhā nāma rūpa nirodhaḥ nāma rūpa nirodhā saḷāyatana nirodho

original: saḷāyatananirodhā phassanirodho, phassanirodhā vedanānirodho, vedanānirodhā taṇhānirodho,
analyzed: saḷāyatana nirodhā phassa nirodho phassa nirodhā vedanā nirodhaḥ vedanā nirodhā taṇhā nirodho

original: taṇhānirodhā upādānanirodho, upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhā jātinirodho,
analyzed: taṇhā nirodhāḥ upādāna nirodhaḥ upādāna nirodhāḥ bhava nirodhaḥ bhava nirodhāḥ jāti nirodhaḥ
jāti nirodhā jarā maraṇam soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsāḥ nirujjhanti
evam etassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodhaḥ hoti

original: Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni tīhi khandhehi saṅgahitāni—
analyzed: tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni tīhi khandhehi saṅgahitāni

original: sīlakkhandhena samādhikkhandhena paññākkhandhena, ayaṁ khandhehi otaraṇā.
analyzed: sīla kkhandhena samādhi kkhandhena paññā kkhandhena ayam khandhehi otaraṇā

original: Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni saṅkhārapariyāpannāni ye saṅkhārā anāsavā, no ca bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā.
analyzed: tāni yeva asekkhāni pañca indriyāni saṅkhāra pariyāpannāni ye saṅkhārāḥ anāsavāḥ no ca bhavaṅgā te saṅkhārāḥ dhammadhātu saṅgahitā

original: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṁ āyatanaṁ anāsavaṁ, no ca bhavaṅgaṁ.
analyzed: sā dhammadhātu dhamma āyatana pariyāpannā yam āyatanam anāsava no ca

original: “Ayaṁ ahasmīti anānupassī”ti ayaṁ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā samugghāto, sā sekkhāvimutti, tāniyeva sekkhāni pañcindriyāni.
analyzed: ayam aha asmi iti anānupassī iti ayam sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā samugghāto sā sekkhā vimutti tāni yeva sekkhāni pañca indriyāni

original: Tāniyeva sekkhāni pañcindriyāni vijjā, vijjuppādā avijjānirodho, avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho, evaṁ sabbo paṭiccasamuppādo.
analyzed: tāni yeva sekkhāni pañca indriyāni vijjā vijjuppādā avijjā nirodhaḥ avijjā nirodhā saṅkhāra nirodho evam sabbaḥ paṭiccasamuppādo

original: Sāyeva vijjā saṅkhārapariyāpannā, ye saṅkhārā anāsavā, no ca bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā, ayaṁ dhātūhi otaraṇā.
analyzed: sāyā iva vijjā saṅkhāra pariyāpannā ye saṅkhārāḥ anāsavāḥ no ca bhavaṅgā te saṅkhārāḥ dhammadhātu saṅgahitāḥ ayam dhātūhi otaraṇā

original: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṁ āyatanaṁ anāsavaṁ, no ca bhavaṅgaṁ, ayaṁ āyatanehi otaraṇā.
analyzed: sā dhammadhātu dhamma āyatana pariyāpannā yam āyatanam anāsava no ca āyatanehi otaraṇā

original: Sekkhāya ca vimuttiyā asekkhāya ca vimuttiyā vimutto udatāri oghaṁ atiṇṇapubbaṁ apunabbhavāya.
analyzed: sekkhāya ca vimuttiyā asekkhāya ca vimuttiyā vimuttaḥ udatāri ogham a tiṇṇa pubbam a punabbhavāya
tena āha bhagavān uddham adha iti

original: “Nissitassa calitaṁ, anissitassa calitaṁ natthi, calite asati passaddhi, passaddhiyā
analyzed: nissitassa calita anissitassa calitam natthi calite asati passaddhi passaddhiyā

original: sati nati na hoti, natiyā asati āgatigati na hoti, āgatigatiyā asati cutūpapāto na
analyzed: sati nati na hoti natiyāḥ asati āgati gati na hoti āgati gatiyāḥ asati cutūpapātaḥ na

original: hoti, cutūpapāte asati nevidha na huraṁ na ubhayamantarena esevanto dukkhassā”ti.
analyzed: hoti cutūpapāte asati na huram na ubhayam antarena esevantaḥ dukkhassa ti

original: “Nissitassa calitan”ti nissayo nāma duvidho taṇhānissayo ca diṭṭhinissayo ca.
analyzed: nissitassa calitanti nissayaḥ nāma duvidho taṇhā nissayo ca diṭṭhi nissayo ca

original: Tattha yā rattassa cetanā, ayaṁ taṇhānissayo;
analyzed: tattha yā rattassa cetanā ayam taṇhā nissayo
yā mūḷhassa cetanā ayam diṭṭhi nissayo

original: Cetanā pana saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṁ, evaṁ sabbo paṭiccasamuppādo.
analyzed: cetanā pana saṅkhārā saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇa viññāṇa paccayā nāma rūpa evam sabbo paṭiccasamuppādo

original: Tattha yā rattassa vedanā, ayaṁ sukhā vedanā.
analyzed: tattha yā rattassa vedanā ayam sukhā vedanā

original: Yā sammūḷhassa vedanā, ayaṁ adukkhamasukhā vedanā, imā dve vedanā vedanākkhandho.
analyzed: yā sammūḷhassa vedanā ayam adukkham asukhā vedanā imāḥ dve vedanāḥ vedanā khandho

original: Tattha sukhā vedanā dve indriyāni sukhindriyaṁ somanassindriyañca, adukkhamasukhā vedanā upekkhindriyaṁ.
analyzed: tattha sukhā vedanā dve indriyāni sukha indriyam somanassa indriyam ca adukkham asukhā vedanā upekkhā indriya

original: Tāniyeva indriyāni saṅkhārapariyāpannāni, ye saṅkhārā sāsavā bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā.
analyzed: indriyāni saṅkhāra pariyāpannāni ye saṅkhārā sa āsavā bhavaṅgā te saṅkhārāḥ dhammadhātu saṅgahitā

original: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṁ āyatanaṁ sāsavaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ, ayaṁ āyatanehi otaraṇā.
analyzed: sā dhammadhātu dhamma āyatana pariyāpannā yam āyatanam sa āsavam āyatanehi otaraṇā

original: “Anissitassa calitaṁ natthī”ti samathavasena vā taṇhāya anissito vipassanāvasena vā diṭṭhiyā anissito.
analyzed: anissitassa calitam natthi iti samatha vasena vā taṇhāya anissitaḥ vipassanā vasena vā diṭṭhiyā anissitaḥ

original: Yā vipassanā ayaṁ vijjā, vijjuppādā avijjānirodho, avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho, saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho, evaṁ sabbo paṭiccasamuppādo.
analyzed: yā vipassanā ayam vijjā vijjuppādā avijjā nirodhaḥ avijjā nirodhā saṅkhāra nirodho saṅkhāra nirodhā viññāṇa nirodho evam sabbaḥ paṭiccasamuppādo

original: Sāyeva vipassanā saṅkhārapariyāpannā, ye saṅkhārā anāsavā, no ca bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā.
analyzed: sā yā iva vipassanā saṅkhāra pariyāpannā ye saṅkhārāḥ anāsavāḥ no ca bhavaṅgā te saṅkhārāḥ dhammadhātu saṅgahitā

original: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṁ āyatanaṁ anāsavaṁ, no ca bhavaṅgaṁ.
analyzed: sā dhammadhātu dhamma āyatana pariyāpannā yam āyatanam anāsava no ca

original: “Passaddhiyā satī”ti duvidhā passaddhi kāyikā ca cetasikā ca.
analyzed: passaddhiyā satīti duvidhā passaddhi kāyikā ca cetasikā ca
yam kāyikam sukha ayam kāya passaddhi

original: Yaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ, ayaṁ cetasikā passaddhi.
Passaddhakāyo sukhaṁ vediyati, sukhino cittaṁ samādhiyati, samāhito yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti,
analyzed: passaddha kāyaḥ sukham sukhinaḥ cittam samādhiyati samāhitaḥ yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: yathābhūtaṁ pajānanto nibbindati, nibbindanto virajjati, virāgā vimuccati, vimuttasmiṁ
analyzed: yathābhūtam pajānantaḥ nibbindati nibbindantaḥ virajjati virāgāḥ vimuccati vimuttasmi

original: “vimuttam”iti ñāṇaṁ hoti, “khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ
analyzed: vimuttam iti ñāṇam hoti khīṇā jāti vusitam

original: So na namati rūpesu, na saddesu, na gandhesu, na rasesu, na phoṭṭhabbesu, na dhammesu
analyzed: so na namati rūpesu na saddesu na gandhesu na rasesu na phoṭṭhabbesu na dhammesu

original: khayā rāgassa khayā dosassa khayā mohassa yena rūpena tathāgataṁ tiṭṭhantaṁ carantaṁ
analyzed: khayā rāgassa khayā dosassa khayā mohassa yena rūpena tathāgatam tiṭṭhantam caranta

original: paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya, tassa rūpassa khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā rūpasaṅkhaye
analyzed: paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya tassa rūpassa khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā rūpa saṅkhaye

original: vimutto, tathāgato atthītipi na upeti, natthītipi na upeti, atthi natthītipi na upeti,
analyzed: vimuttaḥ tathāgataḥ atthi itipi na upeti natthi itipi na upeti atthi natthi itipi na upeti
na iva atthi no natthi iti pi na upeti

original: Atha kho gambhīro appameyyo asaṅkheyyo nibbutotiyeva saṅkhaṁ gacchati khayā rāgassa, khayā dosassa, khayā mohassa.
analyzed: atha kho gambhīraḥ appameyyaḥ asaṅkheyyaḥ nibbuta utiyā iva saṅkham gacchati khayā rāgassa khayā dosassa khayā mohassa

original: Yena viññāṇena tathāgataṁ tiṭṭhantaṁ carantaṁ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya, tassa viññāṇassa
analyzed: yena viññāṇena tathāgatam tiṭṭhantam carantam paññāpayamānaḥ paññāpeyya tassa viññāṇassa

original: khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā viññāṇasaṅkhaye vimutto, tathāgato atthītipi
analyzed: khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā viññāṇa saṅkhaye vimuttaḥ tathāgataḥ atthi iti pi

original: na upeti, natthītipi na upeti, atthi natthītipi na upeti, nevatthi no natthītipi na upeti.
analyzed: na upeti natthi itipi na upeti atthi natthi itipi na upeti na iva atthi no natthi itipi na upeti

original: Atha kho gambhīro appameyyo asaṅkheyyo nibbutotiyeva saṅkhaṁ gacchati khayā rāgassa, khayā dosassa, khayā mohassa.
analyzed: atha kho gambhīraḥ appameyyaḥ asaṅkheyyaḥ nibbuta utiyā iva saṅkham gacchati khayā rāgassa khayā dosassa khayā mohassa
gati iti pa id ca bhavaḥ

original: Āgatigatīpi na bhavanti, “nevidhā”ti chasu ajjhattikesu āyatanesu.
“Na ubhayamantarenā”ti phassasamuditesu dhammesu attānaṁ na passati.
analyzed: na ubhayam antarena ati phassa samuditesu dhammesu attānam na passati

original: So duvidho lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca.
analyzed: saḥ duvidhaḥ lokiyaḥ ca lokuttaraḥ ca

original: Tattha lokiyo avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, yāva jarāmaraṇā.
analyzed: tattha lokiyaḥ avijjā paccayā saṅkhārāḥ yāva jarā maraṇā

original: Lokuttaro sīlavato avippaṭisāro jāyati, yāva nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāti.
analyzed: lokuttaraḥ sīlavataḥ a vippaṭisāraḥ jāyati yāva na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāti

original: Tenāha bhagavā “nissitassa calitaṁ anissitassa calitaṁ natthi …pe…
analyzed: tena āha bhagavā nissitassa calitam anissitassa calitam natthi pe
tasmai hi te sukhinaḥ vīta sokā
yesam piyam na atthi kuhiñci loke
piyam na kayirātha kuhiñci loka iti

original: “Ye keci sokā paridevitā vā, dukkhā ca lokasmimanekarūpā piyaṁ paṭiccappabhavanti ete”ti—
analyzed: ye keci paridevitā vā dukkhā ca lokasmim aneka rūpā piyam paṭicca ppabhavanti ete iti
piye asante na bhavanti eta iti

original: Vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṁ, upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṁ, evaṁ sabbaṁ.
analyzed: vedanā paccayā taṇhā taṇhā paccayā upādāna upādāna paccayā bhavaḥ bhava paccayā jāti jāti paccayā jarā maraṇa evam sabba

original: Tāniyeva indriyāni saṅkhārapariyāpannāni, ye saṅkhārā sāsavā bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā.
analyzed: indriyāni saṅkhāra pariyāpannāni ye saṅkhārā sa āsavā bhavaṅgā te saṅkhārāḥ dhammadhātu saṅgahitā

original: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṁ āyatanaṁ sāsavaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ.
analyzed: sā dhammadhātu dhamma āyatana pariyāpannā yam āyatanam sa āsavam bhavaṅga
tasmai hi te sukhinaḥ vīta sokā
yesam piyam na atthi kuhiñci loke
piyam na kayirātha kuhiñci loka iti

original: Taṇhānirodhā upādānanirodho, upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho, evaṁ sabbaṁ.
analyzed: taṇhā nirodhā upādāna nirodhaḥ upādāna nirodhā bhava nirodho evam sabba

original: So samatho dve indriyāni satindriyaṁ samādhindriyañca.
analyzed: saḥ dve indriyāni satindriyam samādhindriyam ca
so yā iva samathaḥ samādhi kkhandho

original: Soyeva samatho saṅkhārapariyāpanno, ye saṅkhārā anāsavā, no ca bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā.
analyzed: so yā iva samathaḥ saṅkhāra pariyāpanno ye saṅkhārāḥ anāsavāḥ no ca bhavaṅgā te saṅkhārāḥ dhammadhātu saṅgahitā

original: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṁ āyatanaṁ anāsavaṁ, no ca bhavaṅgaṁ.
analyzed: sā dhammadhātu dhamma āyatana pariyāpannā yam āyatanam anāsava no ca
yat āha salla viddhaḥ uva ruppati iti idam paṭigha

original: Anunayaṁ paṭighañca pana taṇhāpakkho, taṇhāya ca pana dasarūpīni āyatanāni padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: anunayam paṭigham ca pana taṇhā pakkhaḥ taṇhāya ca pana dasarūpīni āyatanāni padaṭṭhāna

original: Tāniyeva dasa rūpīni rūpakāyo nāmasampayutto, tadubhayaṁ nāmarūpaṁ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṁ, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, evaṁ sabbaṁ.
analyzed: dasa rūpīni rūpa kāyaḥ nāma sampayuttaḥ tad ubhayam nāma rūpa nāma rūpa paccayā saḷāyatana saḷāyatana paccayā phassaḥ phassa paccayā vedanā vedanā paccayā taṇhā evam sabba
tat eva nāma rūpam pañca kkhandhaḥ
tat eva nāma rūpam aṭṭhārasa dhātuyaḥ

original: Tattha yo rūpakāyo imāni pañca rūpīni indriyāni, yo nāmakāyo imāni pañca arūpīni indriyāni, imāni dasa indriyāni.
analyzed: tattha yaḥ rūpa kāyaḥ imāni pañca rūpīni indriyāni yaḥ nāma kāyaḥ imāni pañca arūpīni indriyāni imāni dasa indriyāni

original: Ayaṁ saupādisesā nibbānadhātu, ayaṁ dhātūhi otaraṇā.
analyzed: ayam sa aupādisesā nibbāna dhātu ayam dhātūhi otaraṇā

original: Sāyeva saupādisesā nibbānadhātu vijjā, vijjuppādā avijjānirodho, avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho, evaṁ sabbaṁ.
analyzed: sā āyā iva sa aupādisesā nibbāna dhātu vijjā vijjuppādā avijjā nirodhaḥ avijjā nirodhā saṅkhāra nirodhaḥ evam sabba

original: Sāyeva vijjā saṅkhārapariyāpannā, ye saṅkhārā anāsavā, no ca bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā.
analyzed: sāyā iva vijjā saṅkhāra pariyāpannā ye saṅkhārāḥ anāsavāḥ no ca bhavaṅgā te saṅkhārāḥ dhammadhātu saṅgahitā

original: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṁ āyatanaṁ anāsavaṁ, no ca bhavaṅgaṁ.
analyzed: sā dhammadhātu dhamma āyatana pariyāpannā yam āyatanam anāsava no ca
tena āha bhagavā kāmam kāmayamānaḥ sa ati
ettāvatā paṭicca indriya khandha dhātu āyatanāni samosaraṇa utaraṇāni bhavanti
evam paṭicca indriya khandha dhātu āyatanāni otāretabbāni
tena āha āyasmā mahākaccāyanaḥ yaḥ ca paṭiccuppādaḥ ti
